name: Rotwang
desc: A "mad monk,' exiled from Khaenri'ah, who dreamt of the pitch-black Elysium. His real name is Rauthvangi.

customize.text: Rauthvangi was an outlander in Khaenri'ah, where he studied alchemy and astrology. Once, he found out about the pitch-black Elysium and delved into forbidden dark knowledge, for which he was expelled from the Academy and exiled from Khaenr'ah. He explored the whole world but didn't find any information about the pitch-black Elysium, so he went to

customize.name: Nod-Krai
customize.desc:
The moon-blessed land located in the northwestern regions of Teyvat.

Follow the silver thread spun by the new moon, traverse biting gales and desolate tundras as the snow-kissed lakes, fractured like mirrors, reflect their ageless, glacial radiance. The days are bitterly short, and the night stretches on like a dark, yawning maw. But even then, the light and song of the Welkin Moon will dance gently across the faces of visiting travelers. Up at ye towers, and let your lanterns blaze into the darkness! Until the day comes... when true moonlight bathes this land once more.

customize.name: Belyi Tsar
customize.desc: Tsar of all fae and the first Cryo Archon.

customize.text:
Rauthvangi became the Tsar's favorite through his mastery of alchemy and astrology and took the name Rotwang. The monk wanted to use the Belyi Tsar to achieve his goals.
Lovia
Rotwang wanted to use the sacred relic of the

customize.name: Frostmoon Scions
customize.desc: The descendants of the legendary golden realm, who chose to find new homes among the mountains and forests after abandoning all civilization. The only thing they never forsook was their faith in the "Moon Goddess."

customize.text: , SAMPO Mill, to find the pitch-black Elysium. He and the Archpriestess united to create a perfect heir capable of activating the relic.

customize.name: Reed Miller
customize.desc: A master thief and the founder of the Treasure Hoarders.

customize.text: Rotwang wanted to win over the great thief to his side in order to emerge from the celestial shell.
